stories.original_headline: Jupiter’s clouds are hiding something big
stories.original_summary: Jupiter’s swirling storms have concealed its true makeup for centuries, but a new model is finally peeling back the clouds. Researchers found the planet likely holds significantly more oxygen than the Sun, a key clue to how Jupiter—and the rest of the solar system—came together. The study also revea
stories.fantasy_headline: Ancient Sky-Gazers Unveil Secrets Hidden Within Jupiter's Great Storms
stories.fantasy_story: For ages, the swirling mists of the Great Sky Wanderer, Jupiter, have guarded its true nature. Now, wise Sky-Gazing Wizards, using powerful divining spells, have peeked beneath its celestial veils. They found the Giant Orb holds much more vital essence than the Sun, offering clues to how our entire realm of planets came to be.

stories.original_headline: Puffy baby planets reveal a missing stage of planet formation
stories.original_summary: A young star called V1298 Tau is giving astronomers a front-row seat to the birth of the galaxy’s most common planets. Four massive but extremely low-density worlds orbiting the star appear to be inflated precursors of super-Earths and sub-Neptunes. By watching how the planets subtly tug on one anot
stories.fantasy_headline: Stargazers Witness Birth of New Worlds, Uncovering a Celestial Mystery
stories.fantasy_story: From their lofty towers, the Celestial Scribes gaze upon a newborn sun-spark, V1298 Tau. There, they see four massive, yet strangely airy, young worlds being born. These 'puffy' orbs seem to be early forms of the Mighty Orbs and Lesser Water Worlds, revealing a missing chapter in how planets are forged across the Starry Expanse.

stories.original_headline: Nvidia CEO denies he’s ‘unhappy’ with OpenAI
stories.original_summary: Nvidia's CEO Jensen Huang denied reports that he was unhappy with OpenAI and said his company still planned to make a "huge" investment in the ChatGPT firm. NVIDIA announced in September that it would invest up to $100 billion in OpenAI, but recently, there have been suggestions that the deal might
stories.fantasy_headline: Obsidian Mirror Guildmaster Dispels Rumors, Reaffirms Oracle Alliance
stories.fantasy_story: The revered Guildmaster of the Obsidian Mirror Guild, Jensen of Huang, has silenced whispers that he was displeased with the Oracle's Whisperers' Clan. He declared his guild would still offer a vast fortune in gold coins to the Clan, reaffirming their grand alliance for future enchantments.
